It also deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against such foes.
f78fb843-5bb4-4f10-a2c9-cc98003d7dc2: A bane weapon excels against certain foes. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus. It also deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against such foes.
e09aa198-9de9-46e4-b9fe-9191c321c700: A bane weapon excels against certain foes. This weapon is designated against Giants, Humans, Elves, Orcs and other humanoids goblins call longshanks. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus. It also deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against such foes.
c434026f-fad7-4142-adab-57116220a253: A brilliant energy weapon ignores nonliving matter. Armor and shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (including any enhancement bonuses to that armor) do not count against it because the weapon passes through armor. ({g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, deflection, dodge, natural armor, and other such bonuses still apply.) A brilliant energy weapon cannot harm undead, constructs, or objects.
a8d06168-db74-4268-9d00-fcf074901a54: A corrosive burst weapon functions as a corrosive weapon that also explodes with acid upon striking a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}. The acid does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} from the corrosive ability, a corrosive burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of acid damage on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ×3, add an extra 2d10 points of acid damage instead, and if the multiplier is ×4, add an extra 3d10 points of acid damage.
5fb6ac68-2ff3-44fc-a7d7-887b6536dd6b: A disruption weapon is the bane of all undead. Any undead creature struck in combat must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 14 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or be destroyed. A disruption weapon must be a {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g} melee weapon.
a63f1eb8-f638-4759-a4b2-54c81aa3996a: A fireball {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} generates a searing explosion of flame that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6) to every creature within the area. The explosion creates almost no pressure. Successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
c33b63a4-7ffc-491a-9cba-ddc219a1fc15: A flaming burst weapon functions as a flaming weapon that also explodes with flame upon striking a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}. The fire does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} from the flaming ability, a flaming burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of fire damage on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ×3, add an extra 2d10 points of fire damage instead, and if the multiplier is ×4, add an extra 3d10 points of fire damage.
d97c7a8a-510f-464d-b2ba-9abd01f33af4: A furious weapon serves as a focus for its wielder's anger. When the wielder is raging or under the effect of a rage {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than normal.
7d846487-9f47-4e4e-847e-3fbaffd6daed: A ghost touch weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} normally against incorporeal creatures, regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. An incorporeal creature's 50% reduction in damage from corporeal sources does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against it with ghost touch weapons.
7bdea8b6-fe57-4159-b91e-da2ac41aba4c: A heartseeker weapon ignores the miss chance for {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} against most living targets, though the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} must still target the proper square. This {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special ability{/g} does not apply against aberrations, oozes, plants, outsiders with the elemental subtype, or any creature specifically noted to lack a heart.
cf46f987-e97d-49d4-a35f-afc56d1086fc: A holy weapon is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} and thus bypasses the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of evil alignment.
5541ef94-3185-45e4-82f4-c3e62bd65af0: A loyal weapon refuses to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} the allies of its wielder. Weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is reduced by -5 against friendly targets.
5c1937d2-9c76-4919-a97f-123777407847: A masterwork weapon is a finely crafted version of a normal weapon. Wielding it provides a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
fec5a873-01a7-4d35-bb03-64aedae2a303: A shocking burst weapon functions as a shock weapon that explodes with electricity upon striking a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}. The electricity does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} from the shock ability, a shocking burst weapon deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} points of electricity damage on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ×3, add an extra 2d10 points of electricity damage instead, and if the multiplier is ×4, add an extra 3d10 points.
7368192b-a46b-4363-ab8a-d972f0cf7859: A thundering burst weapon functions as a thundering weapon that explodes with sonic upon striking a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}. The sonic does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} from the thundering ability, a thundering burst weapon deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} points of sonic damage on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ×3, add an extra 2d10 points of sonic damage instead, and if the multiplier is ×4, add an extra 3d10 points.
f3fa1684-ae5b-4741-a54b-ea99e53d9a39: A thundering weapon creates a cacophonous roar like thunder whenever it strikes a target, dealing an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}.
98552501-6a0f-4f94-8465-7e555274e4f2: A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotic-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
a4a7b56e-e6b9-4452-8789-c83833a0374c: A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
a1f5f0fb-d81b-4741-bf02-abeeeec763b1: A {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}lawful-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
8914b255-fc01-4c7c-ad83-fecadcbc50d6: Ability doubles the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}threat range{/g} of a weapon. This benefit doesn't stack with any other effects that expand the threat range of a weapon.
288b72cd-38cf-4803-9ff8-4acf5e0b828a: Against Will-o'-Wisps, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +4 better than its actual bonus.
878b45f5-7dbe-4dcf-8e94-364e5b479ba9: Against a designated foe it deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
a4f6f60a-d604-4c82-a17c-41543d03663f: Against a {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g} foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus.
6a0c553c-142a-46ad-8341-abf8a1375b05: Agile weapons are unusually well balanced and responsive. A wielder with the Weapon Finesse {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can choose to apply her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with an agile weapon in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier (whichever is higher). This modifier to damage is not increased for {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapons, but is still reduced for off-hand weapons.
811ff935-4232-4fb9-b95f-395b5a194e2c: All {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} rolls against {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} foes are automatically successful.
fc26e63f-4b52-4a4f-a705-e53be8ecbbe3: An anarchic weapon is infused with the power of chaos. It makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotically aligned{/g} and thus bypasses the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of lawful alignment.
4ef32677-82ef-460a-a141-b71de3ca1d83: An axiomatic weapon is infused with lawful power. It makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}law-aligned{/g} and thus bypasses the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against chaotic creatures.
7d065eff-5f18-4dc7-8940-198ec3ab7400: An icy burst weapon functions as a frost weapon that also explodes with frost upon striking a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}. The frost does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the frost ability, an icy burst weapon deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ×3, add an extra 2d10 points of cold damage instead, and if the multiplier is ×4, add an extra 3d10 points.
e33c6acd-34a2-4a16-834b-390bb6025d74: An ultrasound weapon creates a hardly hearable noise whenever it strikes a target, dealing an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}.
3c26c408-1af7-44a5-890d-6bb77176ce6d: An unholy weapon is imbued with unholy power. This power makes the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} and thus bypasses the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of good alignment.
2ebdb200-eab2-44e3-9dcf-64dcd859b0c7: An {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} weapon can bypass the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} of certain creatures.
b34d6a5b-219c-40ef-b8e9-a2b38b0ec3b4:
Any creature struck by a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, either from a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g} or from this scimitar, becomes a target of lightning, as per the {g|SpellsCallLightningStorm}Call Lightning Storm{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, 24 {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex{/g} half).
All natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from both the wielder of this scimitar and the wielder's animal companion have concussive and shocking modifiers applied to them. If the wielder is wild shaped into a bear or if their animal companion is a bear, the sonic and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electrical damage{/g} from their attacks is increased to 1d10.
35b4be43-bffe-448f-af62-71691c11e2fc: Caustic weapon deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} on a successful hit.
3e88b891-eb4a-48a0-a21b-fd41881da322: Corrosive weapon deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} on a successful hit.
f360fa71-d7e1-4307-8495-9244e23bb3b8: Creatures hit by the Khanda must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 17 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or be affected by poison for 6 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. Poison deals 1d2 {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g} and {g|ConditionDaze}dazes{/g} a target for 1 round.
5664ad80-4a24-4867-963d-65934ffe605e: Deteriorative weapons a bane to all living things and deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} on a successful hit.
3f408002-cbe3-4059-8a1f-d3a9fd6fc873: Flaming weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a successful hit.
b258061c-858b-4091-a4f3-6da630f8b72a: Flaming weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a successful hit. The fire does not harm the wielder. The effect remains until another command is given.
c3f98828-9a9e-4fc4-a555-0d6def531fcd: Flaming weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a successful hit.
609174b1-e2ab-457a-b1c4-973ef5eafceb: Freezing weapon is sheathed in a terrible, icy cold that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} on a successful hit.
bfe05e7e-3175-4750-9d2d-6b0cd64a4d8f: Frost weapon is sheathed in a terrible, icy cold that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} on a successful hit.
12027fb4-f772-4cfd-a142-60c77926ee73: Greater frost weapon is sheathed in a terrible, icy cold that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} on a successful hit.
e82a00c7-e4b9-4203-b805-e97abf702925: Improved shock weapon is sheathed in crackling electricity that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} on a successful hit.
15f962c0-b760-44e4-ba41-e6aed1ae3232: Incinerating weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a successful hit.
f02ce21c-90a5-499c-85ca-fc0cf0756957: Mined from rocks that fell from the heavens, this ultrahard metal adds to the quality of a weapon or suit of armor. Adamantine is so costly that weapons made from it are always of masterwork quality.
370cc00e-a10f-48da-a16d-7091c0b28205: Mithral is a rare, silvery metal that is lighter than steel but just as hard. An item made from mithral weighs half as much as the same item made from other metals. In the case of weapons, this lighter weight does not change a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category or the ease with which it can be wielded (whether it is light, {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g}, or two-handed). Mithral weapons count as silver for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Weapons fashioned from mithral are always masterwork items as well.
b0bc7080-810c-47c3-bab0-1b7f2230b511: Owner of this item gets +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
3880f3de-bb30-40bf-a9e4-4818a552880e: Radiant weapon is imbued with life essence itself and deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}positive energy damage{/g} on a successful hit.
2e8c7363-6a84-4740-a451-d3600a711c78: Shock weapon is sheathed in crackling electricity that deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} on a successful hit.
c20cbb11-5757-4c4e-b78b-dca42b0bc1cb: The wielder of this weapon gets a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
97d4d05f-3882-4256-8d32-48c33d632334: The wielder of this weapon gets a +8 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
89b58604-c54f-44b8-838d-0a9a96677bb4: The wielder of this weapon gets {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g}.
3f6ca965-bcb6-420e-8bad-9a4cd05827e8: This creature takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g} each turn. Bleeding can be stopped through the application of any effect that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cures{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (even if the bleed is ability damage).
c8a372af-ba90-4a26-9e59-85fdbfd7aab9: This enchantment makes the weapon magic and thus bypasses the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
da341a1b-5bba-48b5-a80a-3a2aeee21041: This iron, mined deep underground and known for its effectiveness against demons and fey creatures, is forged at a lower temperature to preserve its delicate properties.
9433bffb-c84f-40ea-92e2-094e2d2d86fc:
This potent and feared ability allows the weapon to sever the heads of those it strikes.
Upon a {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} of natural 20 (followed by a successful roll to confirm the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}), the weapon severs the opponent's head (if it has one) from its body. Some creatures, such as many aberrations and all oozes, have no heads. Others, such as golems and undead creatures other than vampires, are not affected by the loss of their heads. Most other creatures, however, die when their heads are cut off.
136cfa4a-c2f5-4cb6-a968-76a219a48e90: This staff contains six charges that are replenished each day. By spending three charges it wielder may cast {g|SpellsFireball}fireball{/g}, and by spending two charges, they may cast {g|SpellsScorchingRay}scorching ray{/g}.
01f13d11-6a04-4d09-982f-7a2d54512e49: This weapon functions like caustic, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid the target might have.
671365a4-ab9d-42ea-965e-d1df3a192cdd: This weapon functions like corrosive burst, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid the target might have.
01aeb958-3cba-4bf8-8844-52d3a78d62c5: This weapon functions like corrosive, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to acid the target might have.
1fecf8df-b967-4b49-acd1-00d263d627c0: This weapon functions like flaming burst, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire the target might have.
6b7415aa-aea3-42f1-af99-239d2fb93720: This weapon functions like flaming, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire the target might have.
fc773138-7428-42f8-9ec8-616e611343c5: This weapon functions like freezing, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold the target might have.
2d8f27a0-e096-4d1c-a5b2-1eaa8b527a03: This weapon functions like frost, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold the target might have.
2bccee94-4934-4b3b-87ff-95d1da8099e0: This weapon functions like greater shock, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity the target might have.
f785a034-10de-4395-969f-e1a30b310837: This weapon functions like icy burst, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold the target might have.
7c3b0d6e-217f-401d-b7b6-af82172465b9: This weapon functions like incinerating, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire the target might have.
384339c6-5e90-46d9-842a-09563fe4819a: This weapon functions like shock, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity the target might have.
d7d70292-6492-47cb-9b8a-007d242faef3: This weapon functions like shocking burst, except it bypasses any resistance or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity the target might have.
dbf62458-abb9-4c35-a6fb-e52d706d1cc7: This {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special ability{/g} can only be placed on melee weapons. A furyborn weapon draws power from the anger and frustration the wielder feels when battling foes that refuse to die. Each time the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damages{/g} an opponent with the weapon, its enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} increases by +1 when making {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against that opponent. Enhancement bonus can't be increased this way beyond the maximum value of +5. This extra enhancement bonus goes away if the opponent dies, the wielder uses the weapon to attack a different creature, or 1 hour passes.
bd57fe3b-ffb0-4792-9f1d-42062f028195: This {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special ability{/g} can only be placed on melee weapons. A nullifying weapon suppresses a creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} for a short amount of time. Anytime the weapon strikes a creature with spell resistance, the target's spell resistance is reduced by 1 for 1 minute. On a confirmed {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, its spell resistance is instead reduced by 2. Multiple hits from a nullifying weapon stack.
213350ef-04c1-4d02-a49f-7f4e4f316bf9:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} transforms your body into living flame. You and your equipment are {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immune{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. In fact, every time you would normally take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from fire, you are instead {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} of damage at a rate of 1 point per 3 points of damage the fire {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} would have normally inflicted. You are immune to {g|ConditionBlind}blindness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability score damage{/g}, disease, electricity, poison, and stunning. You have acid {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 30. You take 150% as much damage from cold as normal.
You have a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score. Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} deals an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of fire damage, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks. Fire spells you cast have their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} increased by +1.
d009f80f-297c-4a35-a683-1e15794f366d: Weapon emits a Magic circle against {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} effect. All creatures within the area gain the effects of a {g|SpellsProtectionFromEvil}Protection from evil{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
3617f2a7-22ed-47ce-a8d9-518d9b405967: Weapon is exceptionally large and deals more {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, but {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with it suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} of -2 to attack rolls.
2e1358e8-457a-4af1-bc43-81060dc99c8d: When a vicious weapon strikes an opponent, it creates a flash of disruptive energy that resonates between the opponent and the wielder. This energy deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the opponent and 1d6 points of damage to the wielder.
36e3212d-bc39-4e53-94a8-cd4e443bbffe: When making a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, the wielder of a speed weapon may make one extra attack with it. The attack uses the wielder's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}, plus any modifiers appropriate to the situation. (This benefit is not cumulative with similar effects, such as a {g|SpellsHaste}Haste{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.)
01d201c0-0d0b-4109-afa9-f71d1eb86bbe: When the wielder strikes a creature that is {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g}, {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}, or panicked with a cruel weapon, that creature becomes {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. When the wielder uses the weapon to knock {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} or kill a creature, he gains 5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} that last for 10 minutes.
047735f4-5305-4f58-804f-28241a3f776b: When you have a {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} charged, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus.
41d9564b-b324-423f-bad7-586c34016e82: Whenever a bleed weapon lands a hit, it makes the target bleed for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Bleed will continue until the target receives magic {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} or leaves combat.
cf43d516-813a-4ddd-8283-2a2371660cd8: Whenever you score a hit with this weapon, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionSlowed}slowed{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 14 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} negates this. These effects do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the duration.
fa617835-7085-4ff8-a817-a023dfa56837: Whenever you score a hit with this weapon, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 14 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} negates this. These effects do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the duration.
d31ff011-06fa-4552-aa92-0de8f3483163: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with this weapon, you emit a wave of negative energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to everyone around you. Creatures that take damage from negative energy receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 to halve the damage.
7f0decd8-c731-4592-9d65-ff137786cb48: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with this weapon, your opponent becomes permanently {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 reduces the duration for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
3a7c4d20-e30a-4416-8ef4-639549f9d309: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with this weapon, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 17 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces this to {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for 1 round. These effects do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the duration.
641f43c6-709d-49c2-8227-e8a3d0e21a43: Wielder of this weapon performs {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} as if they had Point-Blank Shot and Precise Shot {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}.
109d5352-95c9-49b8-9777-ac636d3daca7: You blast your enemies with a searing beam of fire. You may fire one ray, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 3rd (to a maximum of three rays at 11th level). Each ray requires a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
d74b4bd4-d662-4a33-be83-ad5855a5608a: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} with this weapon get +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on both attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.

c1314903-0299-4eb0-9d4b-6dd93f47e192: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} with this weapon get an additional +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on both attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.

24589592-c4e2-45e1-943d-ae2bf2e423e3: {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Critical{/g} multiplier of this weapon is increased by 1.
dd3f1c5a-9e67-4d98-a337-3c53350e3807: {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Critical{/g} multiplier of this weapon is ×4 instead of ×3.
46ff05d4-f3e7-4838-9020-a0655a2481ba: {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g} causes spines to grow from your exposed skin, damaging creatures that strike you. Any creature striking you with a melee weapon, an {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strike{/g}, or a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g} takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} +1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +15). Creatures using melee weapons with {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} are unaffected by this spell. Creatures that successfully grapple you take 2d6 points of piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} +1 point per caster level (maximum +15). In addition, your natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and unarmed strikes deal an additional 1d6 points of piercing damage.
